TEXT: You are a novice adventurer and you are about to enter a deep dark cave full of evil Goblins.
Enter and begin the adventure
It's very dark and you can't see anything. You wonder if there is any way to make things easier...
Keep groping in the dark
Look in your backpack for something that can be useful
Without realizing it, you don't notice the ground under your feet and you start to fall. At the bottom of the pit there are many sharp stones...
In the dark you begin to feel inside your backpack. Luckily you brought the necessary materials to create and light a torch
Light the torch and continue
You can finally see something in the dark. The cave has a low ceiling and is quite humid. After advancing a bit you end up reaching a fork
Go to the left (you see a slight light)
Go to the right (the road is totally dark)

You enter the path on the left as you see a slight light in the background. When you arrive you discover that there are dozens of goblins sitting next to a bonfire. As soon as they see you, they all attack you!

You enter the dark tunnel on the right. The path goes up and at the end you end up reaching a hole where you can see some light. Peeking in, you discover that there are many goblins sitting around a bonfire.
It would be dangerous to do anything, it is better that you leave it be and continue through the tunnel.
Maybe you can take down the goblins if you have something useful in your backpack.
After going through your backpack, you discover that you have some things that could be used to kill the Goblins
You have oil, a canteen and a rope, it seems that you can make a bomb to launch the goblins
You have a throwing dagger. You notice that on top of the goblins there are heavy boxes hung with pulleys. You could try to cut the rope by throwing the dagger to smash the goblins

You prepare the bomb, turn it on and throw it. When it explodes, all the goblins are killed by the explosion. However, the force of the shock wave causes the ceiling to collapse and you find your grave under tons of rock...
You aim carefully and manage to cut the rope. All the goblins are crushed to death. Well done!
Go down to see if you can find anything useful in the goblin camp
Continue along the path you were following and leave the goblin camp behind
You go down to the camp and search the goblins and boxes nearby. You find a rather sharp sword that seems to have been recently stolen by the golins. This will help you survive (Survival +50)
Continue going into the cave
You keep walking in the dark. Before you know it, a small goblin appears by surprise!
The goblin doesn't look very big, attack him with a straight punch
Try to tackle the goblin to knock him down and finish him on the ground
You see a rather large stone ahead. Pick it up and throw it at the goblin to do a lot of damage
You punch the goblin square in the face but unexpectedly, it's tougher than it looks. It manages to bite you and hurt you (Survival - 50)
Try to tackle the goblin to knock him down and finish him on the ground
You see a rather large stone ahead. Pick it up and throw it at the goblin to do a lot of damage

You charge at the goblin since it is smaller than you. You manage to knock him to the ground but the goblin is very agile. As you struggle, the goblin scratches you with its sharp claws (Survival -30)
You see a rather large stone ahead. Pick it up and throw it at the goblin to do a lot of damage
You pick up a stone from the ground and throw it directly at the goblin. You hit him in the head and kill him instantly. Well done!
Examine the corpse to see if it has anything useful
The goblin was carrying a small satchel with things he had recently stolen. You manage to get hold of a healing potion and some rags that can be used as bandages (Survival +20)
Collect everything and continue towards the depths
